Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines enemy object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int armor
      Enemy's armor
      (package private) int armor_per_lv
      Enemy's armor he gains per level by scaling with player's level
      (package private) double attack_power
      Enemy's Strength
      (package private) double attack_power_per_lv
      Enemy's strenght he gains per level by scaling with player's level
      (package private) int behaviour
      Enemy AI behavior(1 - offensive, 2 - balanced, 3 - defensive)

      Deffensive ability list

      Damage ability list

      Enemy's Hitpoints

      Enemy's agility

      Enemy's agility he gains per level by scaling with player's level

      Enemy's stamina

      Enemy's stamina he gains per level by scaling with player's level

      List of ultimate abilities
      (package private) double weapon_damage
      Enemy's weapon damage
      (package private) double weapon_damage_per_lv
      Enemy's weapon damage he gains per level by scaling with player's level

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(java.lang.String n,
             int ap,
             int st,
             int sp,
             int arm,
             double wp,
             int ex,
             int g)
        Basic constructor. "per level" variables are filled automatically
        Parameters:
        n - name
        ap - attack power / strenght
        st - stamina
        sp - speed
        arm - armor
        wp - weapon damage
        ex - experience
        g - gold

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(Enemy e,
             int level,
             int b)
        Almost basic copy constructor. It takes into consideration player level(to scale up enemy stats) and sets up new behavior.
        Parameters:
        e - enemy
        level - player's level
        b - behavior
